net.sf.mmm.orient.db.impl

Class OrientDatabaseImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.orient.db.impl.OrientDatabaseImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrientDatabase

    @Named
public class OrientDatabaseImpl
extends AbstractLoggableComponent
implements OrientDatabase
    Implementation to wrap OrientDB for spring.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille
    See Also:
    OrientPlatformTransactionManager

      • doInitialize

        protected void doInitialize()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
        This method performs the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().
        Overrides:
        doInitialize in class AbstractLoggableComponent
